SeriesDescription: Implementation of standard accounting tools to monitor the economic and environmental aspects of tourism (number of tables)
Source: Ministry of Foreign Trade and Tourism (MINCETUR)-VMT-DGITA-DEPTA
FootNote:
From year 2001 until now, Peru through Ministry of Foreign Trade and Tourism (MINCETUR) has developed six tourism satellites accounts:
  i) TSA evaluation year 2001 (published in September 2005);
  ii) TSA evaluation year 2002 (published in June 2010);
 iii) TSA evaluation year 2007 (published in July de 2011),
 iv) TSA evaluation year 2011/2012 (published on 24 July),
 v) TSA evaluation year 2015 (published in December 2019) and
 vi) TSA evaluation year 2017-2018 (presented in July 2021). 
TSA 2018: due to Covid 19 pandemic and to the non-availability of complete information, it was only developed at the level of the main economic indicators and at the aggregate level, such as Tourism GDP, internal tourism consumption and tourism employment, 2015 – 2020
These documents are available in the MINCETUR website: https://www.gob.pe/institucion/mincetur/informes-publicaciones/22168-peru-cuenta-satelite-de-turismo
